segments.text: Now darling , I know that we've bought this house together , but it's just going to be far too expensive to decorate it . I think we should sell it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , no , Nathan , I ... I really think we've bought this flat at the right time , you know . Market prices are going to go up , and I think you'll find in a year or two it will be worth a lot more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But we're going to spend so much money in furnishing and decorating . I think we could get a much cheaper place that's already furnished .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But don't you like this place ? I remember when we came to see it we thought it would be lovely .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , only you liked it really , darling .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , why didn't you say so then ? But I still think we've made a good buy .
segments.speaker: S2
